successes.title: The Newest Hottest Spike Lee Joint
successes.description: Human beings who are addicted to Blood. Funny, Sexy and Bloody. A new kind of love story (and not a remake of "Blacula").

One Day Intensive Boot Camp Led by Me And Mike Ellis, My Longtime First Assistant Director. You Will Be Taught The Ins And Outs Of Working On A Set. The Top Candidates Will Be Interviewed For PA and Intern Positions To Work On This New Spike Lee Kickstarter Joint.

The LE BOOK Limited Edition Tribute Box to Spike Lee. Le Book is a global network and resource that offers exposure to companies and members of the creative community. One of the hottest international references for Fashion Video photography illustration advertising  design production events. These books feature memorable photographs and artwork from my various films. Signed by me. (Photo to the Left under REWARD UPDATES)

Artist Jermaine Rogers signed artist proof of Spike Lee. 24"x18" screen print on white gallery stock. 2009. Promotional artwork for the 2009 AFROPUNK Festival in Brooklyn, NY. Signed by artist and me. (Photo to the Left under REWARD UPDATES)
Rap Quotes Campaign by Jay Shells. CROOKLYN verse. Size 12"x18" on Sintra. 2013. Signed by artist and me. (Photo to the Left under REWARD UPDATES)
2009 Spike Joint 19"x27" print by Atlanta Based Underground Artist Goldi Gold. Signed by Goldi Gold and Myself. (Photo to the Left under REWARD UPDATES)

You Will Be An Extra In Our Film
Five custom designed Jordans by world renowned designer, Van Monroe. We pick the Jordan and you pick the Joint. (Examples of Van's work on the main page of our Kickstarter)

BOOMBOX photograph by LYLE OWERKO.
Project name: THE BOOMBOX Description: Boombox 28"x42" printed on 30"x44" ILFORD archival paper. Signed by artist and me. (Photo to the Left under REWARD UPDATES)

You Will Attend My Special Limited Master Filmmaker Class Which Will be An All-Day Seminar At My 40 Acres And A Mule Filmworks Building In Da Republic Of Brooklyn, New York. This Also Includes a Museum Like Tour.
Join the great Raphael Saadiq and I for a one time recording session in his own LA studio. As we observe him record the songs for our Film
Acceptance of this reward, requires you to sign a non-disclosure agreement. Quantity of this reward is limited.
Join me in a memorable experience. I am inviting you to spend a full work day with me and the editor to observe the editing process. This day includes lunch.
Acceptance of this reward, requires you to sign a non-disclosure agreement. Quantity of this reward is limited.
You Will be My Associate Producer On Our Film. Your Name Will Appear In The End Credits With An Associate Producer Credit.

I Will Fly To Your Hometown (US Only), Rent A Theater, screen a SPIKE LEE JOINT Of Your Choice And An Intimate Q&A Afterwards For You And 50 Of Your Friends. Get Your Friends To Crowdfund $100 Each And You Can Have This Great Experience.
Portrait Of Me Taken By The Great Photographer Barron Claiborne. 11"x14" Print Signed by the both of us.
A 16"x20" Archival C-Print from INTIMATE Nudes by Marc Baptiste. 1 of 25 subject: Binta Grier

This Award Is For All Playa-Playas. For 10 Grand I'm Taking You to Dinner, Then You Will Have The Honor And Privilege To Sit Next To Me (IN MY WIFE'S TONYA'S SEAT) COURTSIDE - FRONT ROW IN THE BEST SEAT IN THE HOUSE AT THE WORLD'S MOST FAMOUS ARENA - MADISON SQUARE GARDEN TO SEE OUR BELOVED NEW YORK KNICKERBOCKERS, ORANGE AND BLUE SKIES. IF YOU DON'T KNOW THIS IS ONE OF THE TRUE GREAT SPORTING EVENTS TODAY. YOU WILL REMEMBER THIS EXPERIENCE AS LONG AS YOU LIVE. THIS IS A VERY LIMITED ITEM. YOU SLOW - YOU BLOW. THIS IS BIG, BIG TIME. PS. KNICKS WILL BE GREAT THIS COMING NEW SEASON.
So There You Have It. The Awards Are Affordable To One And All We Need Everyone To Help This Cause.
Many Thanks In Advance. I Can't Do This Without You. This Will Truly Be A Community Generated Spike Lee Joint. YA-DIG? SHO-NUFF
